Uses of Interface
io.atomix.resource.Resource

  • Packages that use Resource 
    Package Description
    io.atomix
    Core Atomix APIs for creating and operating on distributed objects.
    io.atomix.collections
    Provides distributed collections such as DistributedMap DistributedMultiMap, DistributedQueue, and DistributedSet.
    io.atomix.concurrent
    Provides distributed coordination resources such as io.atomix.coordination.DistributedLock and io.atomix.coordination.DistributedGroup.
    io.atomix.group
    Provides distributed group operations tools via DistributedGroup including leader election, direct messaging, tasks queues, partitioning, and remote execution.
    io.atomix.manager
    Provides APIs for creating custom resources via ResourceClient.
    io.atomix.messaging
    Provides distributed messaging resources such as DistributedMessageBus for unreliable messaging, DistributedTopic for publish-subscribe messaging, and DistributedTaskQueue for asynchronous processing.
    io.atomix.resource
    Base classes and interfaces for creating and operating on replicated state machines in Atomix.
    io.atomix.variables
    Provides distributed variables such as DistributedValue and DistributedLong.

    • Uses of Resource in io.atomix.collections

      Classes in io.atomix.collections that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DistributedMap<K,V>
      Stores a map of keys to values.
      class  DistributedMultiMap<K,V>
      Stores a map of keys to multiple values.
      class  DistributedQueue<T>
      Distributed collection designed for holding ordered items for processing.
      class  DistributedSet<T>
      Distributed collection of unique values.

    • Uses of Resource in io.atomix.concurrent

      Classes in io.atomix.concurrent that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DistributedLock
      Facilitates synchronizing access to cluster-wide shared resources.

    • Uses of Resource in io.atomix.group

      Subinterfaces of Resource in io.atomix.group 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  DistributedGroup
      Generic group abstraction for managing group membership, service discovery, leader election, and remote scheduling and execution.
      Classes in io.atomix.group that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ConsistentHashGroup
      DistributedGroup that consistently maps values to members on a ring.
      class  GroupPartition
      Group partition.
      class  MembershipGroup
      Base DistributedGroup implementation which manages a membership set for the group and all SubGroups.
      class  PartitionGroup
      Group partitions.
      class  SubGroup
      Base class for subgroups of DistributedGroup.

    • Uses of Resource in io.atomix.messaging

      Classes in io.atomix.messaging that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DistributedMessageBus
      Provides a light-weight asynchronous messaging layer over Atomix's Transport.
      class  DistributedTaskQueue<T>
      Distributed task queue.
      class  DistributedTopic<T>
      Facilitates persistent publish-subscribe messaging in the cluster.

      Abstract resource.
      interface  Resource<T extends Resource<T>>
      Base class for fault-tolerant stateful distributed objects.

      Resource factory.

    • Uses of Resource in io.atomix.variables

      Classes in io.atomix.variables that implement Resource 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDistributedValue<T extends AbstractDistributedValue<T,U>,U>
      Base class for distributed atomic variables.
      class  DistributedLong
      Stores a replicated 64-bit number, supporting atomic increments, decrements, and compare-and-set.
      class  DistributedValue<T>
      Stores a single replicated value, providing atomic operations for modifying the value.
